pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, June 28, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Toronto, Ontario

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the CEO of Bell Canada, George Cope.

Closed to media

10:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the president and CEO of Toronto-Dominion Bank, Bharat Masrani.

Closed to media

10:40 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the president and CEO of Scotiabank, Brian Porter.

Closed to media
